data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Dev: The problem with your baking is that you are too careless with the ingredients. The ____ need ____ be ____. Otherwise, the ____ won't ____ correctly.
Susan: If ____ don't ____ my ____, ____ don't ____ to ____ them. I think that this one came out just fine.
data.partBlankContent:
Dev: The problem with your baking is that you are too careless with the ingredients. The measur______ need t_ be pre____. Otherwise, the ca__ won't ba__ correctly.
Susan: If y__ don't li__ my ca___, y__ don't ha__ to e__ them. I think that this one came out just fine.
data.answer:
戴夫:你烘焙的问题在于你对配料太粗心了。测量需要精确。否则，蛋糕就烤不好了。
苏珊:如果你不喜欢我做的蛋糕，你可以不吃。我觉得这个出来的很好。
